overview: When Arjun (Prosenjit Chatterjee) is framed by his own brothers for stealing, their mother, Bharati, throws Arjun out of the house. Soon, Arjun's brothers also deceit Bharati and acquire all the properties in their name. But, behind the brothers' heinous actions is Sanatan, a rich landowner who has his eyes on Bharati's properties. When Arjun comes to know of Sanatan's wicked manoeuvre, he embarks to seek revenge for his family.
title: Badla
